lines.text:
[narrating a letter]
My husband is having an affair with your wife. I don't think we should talk about it... unless you're prepared to kill them.
Oh man! Oh God, oh man! Oh God, oh man! Oh God, oh man! Oh God, oh man, oh God!
Madden, take it in the mouth or you'll die. Will you take my pride and joy into your mouth?
Six months ago, they told me to stop or I was dead. I stopped. Now the spirits circle around my bed and they tell me to dance. I tell 'em, "Tough guys don't dance." They answer me, "Keep dancing."
I am all wrong for this kind of imbroglio!
